description:
HotAppDeals is the ultimate resource for app store price changes and trends. No spam or nonsense, just the hottest app deals pushed to your phone.

Features include:

-See what apps have recently been made free: be sure to get in there early!
-View recent and popular apps that are on sale: easily see the best deals on the app store specific to your country.
-Watch your favorite apps and get push notifications when they’re on sale: never again will you miss the best time to buy that app.
-See beautiful graphs showing how the price of an app has changed since it's release.
-See a video of the app in action.
-Totally free: no adverts, subscriptions, in app purchases or 'pro' versions.
-Share your favorite deals through Facebook, Twitter, Email or SMS: your family and friends couldn't be happier.
-Fully compatible with the latest iPhones, iPod touches and iPads: universal application supporting iOS7, iCloud syncing and the retina display.

Go ahead... Just one tap away to a lifetime of savings!
releaseNotes:
This version only supports iOS7+

-Set default applications to open links. Do this by holding down on any link and selecting the application you want to open it with!
-iOS7 compatibility: Share deals via AirDrop, Dynamic type support
